name: WildFly Galleon feature-pack for the Cloud
description: This feature-pack adjusts the WildFly layers to run on the cloud.

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: Support for Jakarta XML Web Services, adjusted for the cloud

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: Support for Jakarta Mail, adjusted for the cloud.

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: WildFly undertow subsystem, adjusted for the cloud

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: Support for connections to a remote Jakarta Messaging broker, adjusted for the cloud

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: WildFly transactions subsystem, adjusted for the cloud

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: Support for distributable web applications. Configures a non-local Infinispan-based container web cache for data session handling suitable to clustering environments, adjusted for the cloud.

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: WildFly base server, adjusted for the cloud

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: Support for securing deployment with OIDC, adjusted for the cloud

properties.name: org.wildfly.rule.add-on-description
properties.value: Configure connection to a remote broker using MQ_SERVICE_PREFIX_MAPPING env variable.

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: WildFly Management, adjusted for the cloud

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: Infinispan-based distributed cache for stateful session beans, adjusted for the cloud

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: WildFly Logging subsystem, adjusted for the cloud

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: Support for JPA (using the latest WildFly supported Hibernate release), adjusted for the cloud

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: A default configuration for the cloud. Note that all JBoss Modules modules are provisioned.

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: Support for JPA with a distributed second level cache, adjusted for the cloud

properties.name: org.wildfly.description
properties.value: Support for an embedded Apache Activemq Artemis Jakarta Messaging broker, adjusted for the cloud
